subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Lakers used their 7-footers Pau Gasol (19 points) and Andrew Bynum (13) to dominate inside against the Thunder, winning Game 1 of their Western Conference playoff series.
snippet: The Lakers used their 7-footers Pau Gasol (19 points) and Andrew Bynum (13) to dominate inside against the Thunder, winning Game 1 of their Western Conference playoff series.
